rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Small foyer that opens to the main areas, includes storage and coat closet. Placed according to Vastu for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Combined space with minimalist design featuring modern fixtures and ample natural lighting through a large window on the south-east wall, aligned per Vastu for energy and prosperity. Seamless integration of cooking area with living space.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Functional guest washroom placed near the entrance, adhering to local building norms and privacy requirements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with attached bathroom and walk-in closet. Positioned in the north-west sector as per Vastu for harmony.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom placed towards the south-east to ensure positive energy flow and privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom in a location that complements the overall floor plan, ensuring balanced Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom for Bedrooms 2 and 3, placed near the corridor.
